fr:mainmatter.fr:p: The long exact sequence of relative cohomology \operatorname {H}^n(Y_\bullet ,\mathbb {Z}) \to \operatorname {H}^n(X_\bullet ,\mathbb {Z}) \xrightarrow {j} \operatorname {H}^{n+1}(Y_\bullet \operatorname {mod} X_\bullet ,\mathbb {Z}) \to \operatorname {H}^{n+1}(Y_\bullet ,\mathbb {Z}) is a long exact sequence of mixed Hodge structures.
